abilities.name: Stopping Power
abilities.hint: One enemy within 3 hexes suffers %game.damage:3% (plus modifier—Disadvantage if adjacent).
abilities.bottomHint: One adjacent enemy cannot move until the end of its next turn, then move up to 3 hexes away.

abilities.name: Double Throw
abilities.hint: Up to two enemies within 3 hexes suffer %game.damage:2% (plus a separate modifier for each—Disadvantage if adjacent).

bottomActions.value: Add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks this turn.

abilities.name: Disorienting Barrage
abilities.hint: <small>Up to three enemies within 3 hexes suffer %game.damage:1% (plus a separate modifier for each—Disadvantage if adjacent) and gain Disadvantage on all of their attacks until the end of their next turn.</small>

abilities.name: Center Mass
abilities.hint: One enemy within 3 hexes suffers %game.damage:3% (plus modifier—Disadvantage if adjacent).

abilities.name: Center Mass
abilities.hint: One enemy within 3 hexes suffers %game.damage:3% (plus modifier—Disadvantage if adjacent).
abilities.bottomHint: Move up to 3 hexes away, then one adjacent enemy is moved up to 2 hexes away from you.

abilities.name: Close Cuts
abilities.hint: All enemies in the targeted area suffer %game.damage:3% (plus a separate modifier for each).
abilities.bottomHint: Move up to 4 hexes away, then collect all money tokens and treasure tiles in or adjacent to your hex and lose this card.

actions.value: <small>Place one of your character tokens on this card. You may add +3 %game.action.attack% to any of your ranged attacks by moving the token from this card to the target after the attack ability is resolved. When the target dies, place the token on the hex in which it died. If you loot that hex, return the token to this card.</small>

subActions.value: If the target has your Favorite token, return the token to its card.
Target all enemies adjacent to any hex you entered during the movement

bottomActions.value: Double the value of your next attack this round.

subActions.value: Add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target has your Favorite token.
Add +2 %game.action.move% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if you killed an enemy this round.
Target one ally adjacent to the target of the attack

bottomActions.value: On your next four Move abilities, add +2 %game.action.move%.
Add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks this round.

subActions.value: Add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target has your Favorite token.
Target a different enemy within %game.action.range:2% of the target of the previous Attack ability

bottomActions.value: On your next four attacks when possible, one enemy adjacent to the target suffers %game.damage:2%.

subActions.value: <small>If this attack kills the target, one enemy adjacent to the hex in which it died suffers X damage, where X is the amount of damage the target would have suffered in excess of what was needed to kill it.</small>
Add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if you killed an enemy this round.

actions.value: On your next five attacks, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.wound%
If an adjacent enemy has your Favorite token, you may return the token to its card. If you do, the adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:2% and gains %game.condition.wound%.

subActions.value: Add %game.condition.strengthen% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if you killed an enemy this round.

bottomActions.value: <small>The next five times an enemy ends a Move ability within %game.action.range:5%, perform an "%game.action.attack:2%, %game.action.range:5%" action targeting that enemy.</small>

actions.value: <small>Place the Axe token on this card. You may add +3 %game.action.attack%, %game.condition.wound%, and %game.action.push:1% to any of your ranged attacks by moving the token from this card to the target after the attack ability is resolved. When the target dies, place the token on the hex in which it died. If you loot that hex, return the token to this card. This card cannot be active while "The Favorite" is active.</small>

bottomActions.value: If your Favorite token is in or adjacent to your hex, you may perform

actions.value: On your next five attacks targeting an enemy that has your Favorite token, add +2 %game.action.attack%.

subActions.value: Add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target has your Favorite token, then return the token to its card.

bottomActions.value: <small>The next five times you kill an enemy, all enemies adjacent to the hex in which it died suffer %game.damage:2%.</small>
Add +2 %game.action.attack% to your next attack this turn if you are adjacent to an ally.

actions.value: One adjacent normal or elite enemy suffers %game.damage:12%.

bottomActions.value: If you killed an enemy this round, return your Favorite token to its card and gain %game.card.experience:1%.
<small>The next four times you kill an enemy, perform a "%game.action.heal:3%, %game.action.range:2%, %game.condition.bless%" action.</small>
